name: stat
desc: Tampilkan info detail file (size, modified, etc).
author: Termz
command:
import os
import datetime
try:
    filename = input('Nama file: ')
    if not os.path.exists(filename):
        print(f"Error: File '{filename}' tidak ditemukan.")
        exit()

    stats = os.stat(filename)
    print(f'--- Info File: {filename} ---')
    print(f'Ukuran: {stats.st_size} bytes')
    print(f'Mode: {oct(stats.st_mode)[-3:]}')
    print(f'Device: {stats.st_dev}')
    print(f'User ID: {stats.st_uid}')
    print(f'Group ID: {stats.st_gid}')
    print(f"Modifikasi Terakhir: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(stats.st_mtime)}")
    print(f"Dibuat: {datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(stats.st_ctime)}")
except Exception as e:
    print(f'Error: {e}')
